title: Consolidated Statements of Income - USD ($)shares in Millions, $ in Millions

Revenues:.label: Net sales
Revenues:.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues:.label: Membership and other income
Revenues:.definition: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

Revenues:.label: Total revenues
Revenues:.definition: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Costs and expenses:.label: Cost of sales
Costs and expenses:.definition: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

Costs and expenses:.label: Operating, selling, general and administrative expenses
Costs and expenses:.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Costs and expenses:.label: Operating income
Costs and expenses:.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Interest:.label: Debt
Interest:.definition: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

Interest:.label: Finance lease
Interest:.definition: Finance Lease and Financing Obligation, Interest Expense

Interest:.label: Interest income
Interest:.definition: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Interest:.label: Interest, net
Interest:.definition: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

Interest:.label: Loss on extinguishment of debt
Interest:.definition: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Interest:.label: Other (gains) and losses
Interest:.definition: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

Interest:.label: Income before income taxes
Interest:.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Interest:.label: Provision for income taxes
Interest:.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Interest:.label: Consolidated net income
Interest:.definition: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Interest:.label: Consolidated net (income) loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
Interest:.definition: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Interest:.label: Consolidated net income attributable to Walmart
Interest:.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Net income per common share:.label: Basic net income per common share attributable to Walmart (in USD per share)
Net income per common share:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Net income per common share:.label: Diluted net income per common share attributable to Walmart (in USD per share)
Net income per common share:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Weighted-average common shares outstandi.label: Basic (in shares)
Weighted-average common shares outstandi.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

Weighted-average common shares outstandi.label: Diluted (in shares)
Weighted-average common shares outstandi.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

Weighted-average common shares outstandi.label: Dividends declared per common share (in USD per share)
Weighted-average common shares outstandi.definition: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.
